statements: SELECT * FROM voter_information;
SELECT voter_name, voter_age, voter_gender FROM voter_information ORDER BY voter_name;
SELECT voter_name, voter_gender FROM voter_information WHERE voter_age > 30;
SELECT voter_name, voter_address, voter_phone_number FROM voter_information WHERE voter_party_affiliation = 'Independent';
SELECT voter_name, voter_age FROM voter_information ORDER BY voter_age DESC;
SELECT voter_name, voter_age FROM voter_information WHERE voter_age > 18 ORDER BY voter_name ASC
SELECT voter_party_affiliation FROM voter_information WHERE voter_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY voter_party_affiliation DESC
SELECT voter_name, voter_age, voter_gender FROM voter_information WHERE voter_party_affiliation = 'Independent' ORDER BY voter_age DESC
SELECT voter_name, voter_address, voter_phone_number FROM voter_information WHERE voter_party_affiliation = 'Republican'
SELECT * FROM voter_information WHERE voter_age < 30 AND voter_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY voter_name
SELECT * FROM VoterInformation;
SELECT voter_name, voter_age FROM VoterInformation WHERE voter_party_affiliation='Republican';
SELECT voter_name, voter_address FROM VoterInformation WHERE voter_age > 50;
SELECT * FROM CampaignAds WHERE ad_budget > 5000;
SELECT ad_title, ad_content FROM CampaignAds WHERE ad_target_audience='Young Voters';
SELECT ad_title, ad_content FROM CampaignAds WHERE ad_budget > 1000 ORDER BY ad_title DESC
SELECT * FROM VoterInformation WHERE voter_party_affiliation = 'Independent'
SELECT ad_title, ad_budget FROM CampaignAds WHERE ad_target_audience = 'Young Voters' AND ad_budget BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY ad_budget
SELECT voter_id, voter_name, voter_age FROM VoterInformation ORDER BY voter_age ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT ad_title, ad_target_audience, ad_budget FROM CampaignAds WHERE ad_target_audience LIKE '%Women%'
SELECT * FROM voter_information;
SELECT voter_name, voter_age FROM voter_information WHERE voter_age BETWEEN 18 AND 30;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_voters FROM voter_information;
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_location FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE target_location = 'New York';
SELECT voter_id, voter_name, voter_age, voter_party_affiliation FROM voter_information WHERE voter_age > 30 ORDER BY voter_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;

SELECT vi.voter_name, ac.campaign_name, vi.voter_party_affiliation FROM voter_information vi JOIN voter_interaction ON vi.voter_id = voter_interaction.voter_id JOIN advertising_campaigns ac ON advertising_campaigns.campaign_id = voter_interaction.campaign_id WHERE vi.voter_party_affiliation = 'Democrat' ORDER BY vi.voter_name ASC, ac.campaign_name ASC;

SELECT vi.voter_name, vi.voter_age, ai.interaction_date, ai.interaction_type FROM voter_information vi JOIN voter_interaction ai ON vi.voter_id = ai.voter_id WHERE ai.interaction_type = 'phone call' ORDER BY ai.interaction_date DESC;

SELECT vi.voter_name, ac.campaign_name, ai.interaction_date, ai.interaction_type FROM voter_information vi JOIN voter_interaction ai ON vi.voter_id = ai.voter_id JOIN advertising_campaigns ac ON ac.campaign_id = ai.campaign_id WHERE vi.voter_age > 18 AND ac.target_location = 'Florida' ORDER BY ai.interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM voter_info;
SELECT voter_name, age, location FROM voter_info WHERE political_affiliation = 'Independent';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaign ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_targets WHERE target_location IN ('City A', 'City B');
SELECT ad_id, engagement_type, engagement_date FROM ad_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'Click' ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM voter_info WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY voter_name ASC;
SELECT voter_name, location, political_affiliation FROM voter_info WHERE political_affiliation = 'Democrat';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT ad_id, voter_id, engagement_type FROM ad_engagement WHERE engagement_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;
SELECT voter_name, age, location, political_affiliation FROM voter_info WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM Voters LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, city, state FROM Voters WHERE age > 30;
SELECT voter_id, first_name, last_name, party_affiliation FROM Voters WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget, campaign_goal FROM Campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM Voters ORDER BY age DESC, last_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM Voters WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democrat'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT ad_name, ad_cost, ad_frequency FROM Ads WHERE ad_frequency IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ad_cost DESC
SELECT total_budget_spent, total_engagements, report_comments FROM CampaignReports WHERE total_engagements > 500 ORDER BY total_budget_spent
